alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SCHUYLKILL AND SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 636 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong rotating thunderstorm near Shenandoah, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tamaqua, Mcadoo, Hometown, Oneida, Grier City-Park Crest, Delano, Nuremburg, Sheppton, Brandonville, Coaldale, Shumans, Shenandoah Heights, Ringtown, Kelayres, Park Place and Trenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.
